data.description:
When you create this symbol, choose a damage type: air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light, or poison. The creature bearing this symbol gains Resistance to the chosen damage type.

You Spend: @LOSS[2 ip]
Target Receives: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.DIIjNoX0kFH4kLLJ], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.nGajoBTZKWiBR3iT], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.xUpWUYONnQaJXZOE], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ih8nc2XW6EvbEeP9], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.7GNmX9JfWl8SWJhi], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.xcymcgcV8ki9jjmy], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.WEOShNDbjf9BEQzE], or @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.jWFQV3GgAoXLvQ2W]
